name: MR ELECTRO MAN
description:
MR ELECTRO MAN is a fun game where you push a cube into a location to stay alive. Be careful as you don't know who lurks in the shadows.

Controls:

Movement: w, a, s, d 

Shoot: Left click

Dash: Right Click

How to play:

There will be a 25 second timer in which you need to push the energy cube into the drop off point. If achieved in 25 seconds another drop off point will spawn and you task is to push the cube into the drop off in 25 seconds. The twist. There are enemies trying to kill you when you are moving the cube. Are you able to power up the ship or will you fall to the army of enemies? Only time will tell!
